title: Day 148 (Psalm 111-118) - Year 4

description:
SHOW NOTES: 

- All the info you need to START is on our website! Seriously, go there. - Join our PATREON community for bonus perks!

- Get your TBR merch

- Show credits

 

FROM TODAY’S PODCAST: 

- John 10:9

- Video: 1 Kings Summary

- Join us on a trip to Israel! Find out more at israelux.com!
